EmailTemplate.name: Ignite 2015 - CABHITCH
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015: Tickets are officially Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tickets are now available!
Ignite is a one off event where: you can explore your potential by gaining new skills in our amazing workshops, meet professionals from various industries, reconnect with you fellow NCS participants, and make your next step to becoming community champions.
When: Saturday 28th November Time: Doors open at 9:45 Where: somewhere special in Islington (address will be revealed once tickets are booked)
How can get I a ticket Click Here to Register for a ticket
Tickets are given on a first come first serve basis so do not delay!
